title: Migrate AGENT-QUICKSTART.md content to Diátaxis structure
description:
Migrate content from AGENT-QUICKSTART.md into the appropriate Diátaxis documentation structure and remove the legacy file.

## Content Mapping

**From AGENT-QUICKSTART.md (416 lines) to:**

- `docs/concepts/overview.md` - Core concepts (what is JIT, why agents)
- `docs/concepts/core-model.md` - Issue states, label format, required labels
- `docs/tutorials/quickstart.md` - Agent onboarding (get productive in 5 minutes)
- `docs/how-to/custom-gates.md` - Gate usage for agents
- `docs/reference/cli-commands.md` - MCP tools and JSON output

## Key Content to Preserve

- Agent-first mental model
- Label format requirements (namespace:value, validation)
- Issue state machine
- MCP tools reference
- Common agent workflows
- Gate usage patterns for agents

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All agent-specific content migrated to appropriate docs
- [ ] Agent perspective maintained in concepts/tutorials
- [ ] Gate workflows documented for agents
- [ ] AGENT-QUICKSTART.md deleted (no redirects, clean removal)
- [ ] No broken references to AGENT-QUICKSTART.md in codebase

## Related

Part of Epic cfb3ba94 (User Documentation Phase 2) - Story 48e2e917 (Gate System Documentation)
